name: .KL
summary: Learn about .KL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: KL files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the Google Android operating system references the file to correctly map input gathered from a device to actions in Android.

However, if you are looking to modify the key layout map, you can open KL files with a text editor. After modifying the KL file, you must place it back in the directory in which you found it for it to take effect.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .kl file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.62
images.caption: KL file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.62
